title: Saskfarmer
author: Saskfarmer
content: Just got a batch in of the S19 Jpro+'s and the suns of bitches have gone back to solder on heat sinks.   One arrived with a heat sink jingling in the case with a piss poor solder and chip guts on it.Guess I'll find out, power'd up a couple weeks ago.

comments.author: Saskfarmer
comments.body: Is that justification?   I don’t care if it’s 5$ a TH!   Still have S17 nightmares.

comments.author: philipma1957
comments.body: its old news there are some posts on this.So be sure to run them cool .Treat them like fine china from china.  I have at least ½ of my s17's set to low and running on their sides with the bigger sized chip heatsink facing upwards.
